comment: She has a bunch of homework that is what helped me pass the class, but her lectures are interesting. Shes also very funny and keeps me entertained. She has a lot of assignments and extra credit to get your grade up because the tests are hard. Good teacher if you want to do psych careers.

the assignments she gives are easy: quizzes for each chapter (you do questions until you get enough points so its not graded for accuracy), some writing assignments which are usually like two paragraphs, and theres 4 exams plus the final but she curves them, also gives a lot of extra credit and she makes the class interesting great professor

The tests for this class were basically built off of material that you have to teach to your yourself. The material in lectures is very pointless and she gives way too many tests, to not teach a thing. I do not recommend.

I would not recommend this professor. Amount of content present in class is three classes worth of material. Professor zooms through said content leaving no time for students to comprehend material, and expects students to dedicate majority of their time to her class.
Take a different Professor. She goes too fast through lecturers and the tests count more than anything. Tests have 5 essay questions all worth 10 points.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things
